meanings.definition: The branch of psychology that deals with the physiological basis of psychological processes.
meanings.sent1: Psychophysiology helps us understand how our bodies and minds are connected.
meanings.sent2: Researchers in psychophysiology study how our physical health affects our mental well-being.
meanings.sent3: Learning about psychophysiology can be like solving a fascinating puzzle.
meanings.sent4: The intricate dance between body and mind is at the core of psychophysiology.
meanings.sent5: Exploring psychophysiology is like unraveling the secrets of our inner workings.

meanings.definition: The study of the relationship between physiological processes and behavior.
meanings.sent1: Understanding psychophysiology helps us see how our actions are linked to our body functions.
meanings.sent2: Psychophysiology research shows how our physical state influences our actions.
meanings.sent3: Studying psychophysiology can be as eye-opening as connecting the dots between body and behavior.
meanings.sent4: In the realm of psychophysiology, the body whispers secrets that shape our behaviors.
meanings.sent5: The study of psychophysiology paints a vivid picture of the intricate dance between our bodies and actions.
